title: Futbol Americas: Did LAFC prove they are title ready?
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar recap the MLS Cup Playoffs. Did LAFC prove they are title ready? Then the guys recap the Liga MX semifinal matchups. How did Toluca pull of the upset against Club América? Next, Julie Foudy joins the show to talk about the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup draw and the NWSL playoffs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
